InstalledItem.Name: Reclaimer 2954 Best in Show Livery
InstalledItem.Description: This purple and white 2954 Best in Show Livery celebrates the Reclaimer making it to the final four of the 2954 Ship Showdown.

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.

InstalledItem.Name: Algid
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Industrial

The Reclaimer is a ship renowned for its ability to work long and hard. To help support even the most arduous salvaging projects, Aegis develop the bespoke Algid cooler.

InstalledItem.Name: Kama
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Kama from Juno Starwerk has won more “Fan Favorite” reader’s poll from ‘Long Haul Quarterly’ than any other industrial quantum drive in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: RS-Barrier
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Industrial

Designed to defend against the debris common during large-scale salvage projects, Aegis Dynamics developed this bespoke industrial shield generator in-house for the Reclaimer.

InstalledItem.Name: Baler Salvage Head
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Salvage Head
Size: 2

Module Capacity: 3
Gimble Area: ???

Greycat Industrial has spent centuries refining the Baler salvage head into its current form that's both durable and precise even under the harshest of conditions. Designed to swap between three modules, the Baler will be ready to rip apart whatever hull you find. Experience why it's the standard salvage head for countless personal and large-scale industrial operations across the universe.

InstalledItem.Name: ReadyGrip Tractor Module
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Tractor Beam
Max Angle: 60°
Max Range: 150 m
Full Strength Distance: 75 m

The Ready Grip Tractor Module compresses the dependability and power of Greycat’s signature tractor beam technology into a smaller sub-component that can be attached to a salvaging laser head.

InstalledItem.Name: Trawler Scraper Module
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Scraper Module
Extraction Speed: 0.05/0.15
Radius: 6m
Extraction Efficiency: 65%

Scrape more of a hull in one pass with the Trawler scraper module. While the area of effect is larger than other modules, it is less efficient due to intense heat generating more burn off. Making the Trawler the ideal module to use when a job necessitates speed over efficiency.
